channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Edgar Bronfman Jr. withdraws offer for Paramount, allowing Skydance merger to go ahead
item.description: The merger between entertainment giant Paramount and media company Skydance is set to go ahead after Edgar Bronfman Jr. withdrew a competing offer.

item.title: Does American tennis have a pickleball problem? Upstart’s boom looms out of view at the US Open
item.description: Does American tennis have a pickleball problem? Even as the U.S. Open opened this week with more than a million fans expected for the sport’s biggest showcase, the game’s leaders are being forced to confront the fact that the nation’s fastest-growing sport is actually pickleball, which has seen part

item.title: Judge accepts insanity plea from man who attacked Virginia congressman’s office with bat
item.description: A northern Virginia man who attacked staffers in the district office of U.S. Rep. Gerry Connolly with a baseball bat has been found not guilty by reason of insanity.
